channel.title: CVE Feed for Liferay -- DXP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Liferay -- DXP

item.title: CVE-2023-3426|2024-10-11T14:09:13.856Z -- liferay -- dxp
item.description: The organization selector in Liferay Portal 7.4.3.81 through 7.4.3.85, and Liferay DXP 7.4 update 81 through 85 does not check user permission, which allows remote authenticated users to obtain a list of all organizations.
